page.title: 11DAY & RESIDENTIAL TRIPS
page.content: _ Since the school opened in 1981 a programme of{day trips}and{residential {visits}(in curriculum time) has been built up to gain valuable experience outside the classroom. YEAR 1_BLACKLAND FARM_an outdoor pursuits centre. They go for social reasons and it is near home. YEAR 2_NEWCASTLE_to find out about different ways of living and to work with other schools. YEAR 3_ISLE OF WIGHT and ISLES OF SCILLY_to explore new places. YEAR 4_in the last few weeks of their time at the school there is an Opportunity Programme to follow a different timetable_South Downs Walk, camping in Dorset, Paris, French Exchange. There are day trips also throughout the year_Dorking, different farms, Crawley and museums...by Dawn Newman.
